Modules
EMV

Modules

 EMV RFID Hardware Abstraction Layer.
 

This module abstracts the RFID hardware in use from the EMV L1 contactless comunication protocol stack.


 EMV Layer 4 and Example Terminal Application
 

EMV Layer 4 data transmission and example implementation of an EMV contactless terminal main loop.


 EMV Card Technology Specific Functions
 

This part contains RFID card operations which are in general available on every card technology but the implementation of which depends on the card technology (ISO14443-A or ISO14443-B) in use.


EMV module error codes

Error codes used by the EMV module.

#define EMV_ERR_OK   0
#define EMV_ERR_COLLISION   -1
#define EMV_ERR_PROTOCOL   -2
#define EMV_ERR_TRANSMISSION   -3
#define EMV_ERR_TIMEOUT   -4
#define EMV_ERR_INTERNAL   -5
#define EMV_ERR_STOPPED   -6

Define Documentation

#define EMV_ERR_COLLISION   -1

Received a card response with a bit collision.

#define EMV_ERR_INTERNAL   -5

EMV software stack internal error.

#define EMV_ERR_OK   0

No error occured.

#define EMV_ERR_PROTOCOL   -2

Received a card response with a protocol error.

#define EMV_ERR_STOPPED   -6

Stop current operation request received.

#define EMV_ERR_TIMEOUT   -4

Timeout occured while waiting for a card response.

#define EMV_ERR_TRANSMISSION   -3

Received a card response with a transmission error.
